judgment_text:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY

O.O.C.J.

COMPANY PETITION NO.412 OF 1985

OFFICIAL LIQUIDATOR REPORT DT.3.10.2005

In the matter of M/s. Madhavnagar

Cotton Mills Ltd.(In Liqn.)

Midland Bank Plc.

Petitioner

Mr.T.S.Ingale for Boodhgaon Bleacher.

Mr.Sudarshan Mehta, c/o. Mehta Processors, 708,

Gopalpura, Madhavnagar, Dist.Sangli., Ph.2310991 -

Bidder.

Mr.Nitin Mulye on behalf of purchaser bidder -

Nitinkumar Bafna.

Mrs.Sanainelava Sun i/b.Little & Co. for Sangli Bank.

Mr.S.C.Gupta, Official Liquidator present.

CORAM : A.M. KHANWILKAR,J.

DATED : 6th October 2005

P.C.

Perused 
the 
report 
of 
the 
Official 
Liquidator 
dated

.10.2005. 

Pursuant 
to 
the 
advertisement 
issued 
by 
the

Official 

Liquidator 

only 
two 
offers 
were 

received 

in

sealed 
cover, 
one 
from 
Mehta 
Processors 
and 
the 
other 
is

from 
Boodhgaon 
Bleacher. 

The 
highest 
offer 
amongst 
them

was 

given 

by 

Mehta 

Processors 

in 

the 

sum 

of

Rs.20,25,000/-. 

Both 
the 
participants 
were 
present 

in

court. 

Two 

other 

participants 

were 

interested 

in

participating 

in 
the 
public 
auction 
to 
be 
conducted 

in

open 
court. 

They 
were 
also 
invited 
to 
bid. 

Pursuant 
to
that 

invitation 

Mr.Jagdish 

Tiwari, 
the 

applicant 

in

C.A.No.243/2005 

desired 
to 
submit 
his 
offer. 

He 
stated

that 

he 

was 

unable 

to 

submit 

his 

offer 

due 

to

unavoidable 
circumstances 
inspite 
of 
the 
order 
passed 
by

this 
Court 
on 
September 
, 
. 

As 
he 
appeared 
through

counsel 

and 

tendered 
a 
Bank 
draft 
in 
the 
sum 

of 

Rs.4

lacs 

and 

gave 
offer 
of 
Rs.20 
lacs, 
he 
was 

allowed 

to

participate 

in 

the 

bidding. 

In 
addition 

to 

Jagdish

Tiwari, 

another 
participant 
was 
Mr.N. 

Bafna. 

The 

bid

was 

conduced 

in 

open 
Court 
and 
the 
highest 

offer 

is

given 

by 

Mehta 
Processors 
in 
the 
sum 
of 
Rs. 
lacs

(Rupees 

Twenty 

Nine 

lakhs 

only) 
in 

respect 

of 

the

immovable 

property 

lot 
no.4. 

That 
being 

the 

highest

offer 

and 

in 

excess 

of 
the 

valuation 

done 

by 

the

Sub-Registrar, the same is accepted on usual conditions.

Earnest money deposit of other offerers be returned.

. 

It 
will 
be 
open 
to 
Boodhgaon 
Bleacher 
to 
pursue 
such

remedy against Jagdish Tiwari as may be advised. Those

proceedings will be considered on its own merits.

. 

Official 
Liquidator 
to 
take 
out 
application 
against

the 

valuer 

M/s.Prototype 
Engineering 
Company 
who 

were

earlier 

valuers 

and 
valued 
the 
immovable 

property 

in

their 

report 

and 

on 

which 

basis 

earlier 

sale 

was

confirmed 

in 

respect 

of 

the 

immovable 

property.

Appropriate orders will be passed on the said report
when moved.

. 

The 
amount 
deposited 
by 
Boodhgaon 
Bleacher 
in 

this

court 

pursuant 
to 
the 
earlier 
order 
of 
confirming 

sale

of the immovable property be returned to the said party

along with accrued interest thereon, if any.

. 

Official 

Liquidator 

is 

also 

authorised 

to 

pay

advertisement 

charges 

being 
Rs.19,169/- 
to 

M/s.Admire

Publicity Pvt. Ltd. out of the funds of the company in

liquidation.

. 

On 

receiving 
the 
entire 
consideration 
amount, 

the

Official 

Liquidator 

to 

hand 

over 

the 

immovable

properties 

being 

Lot 

No.4 
situated 
at 

Gut 

No.115-H,

No.708, 

Survey 

No.203(4), 
Tasgaon 

Road, 

Madhavnagar,

Sangli to the highest bidder i.e. M/s.Mehta Processors.

(A.M.
(A.M.
(A.M. KHANWILKAR,J.)
 KHANWILKAR,J.)
 KHANWILKAR,J.)
